RelatedSentence: Jammu : The army Sunday foiled an infiltration bid by militants from across the Line of Control ( LoC ) in Jammu and Kashmir 's Poonch district , an official said .
Jammu : The army Sunday foiled an infiltration bid by militants from across the Line of Control ( LoC ) in Jammu and Kashmir 's Poonch district , an official said .
Alert troops noticed suspicious movement by a group of three terrorists opposite our post in Bhimber Ghali sector of the LoC around 8.30 a.m. today .
When the terrorists were fired upon , they fled towards Pakistani side of the LoC , defence spokesman Col. Manish Mehta told IANS .
During the search operation in the area , an improvised explosive device ( IED ) planted by the terrorists was recovered which was destroyed , he added .
During the search operation in the area , an improvised explosive device ( IED ) planted by the terrorists was recovered which was destroyed , he added .
No damage or casualty has been reported on our side , said Col. Mehta .
